text: Julio Alberto Pérez Cuapio (born July 30, 1977 in Tlaxcala) is a former Mexican racing cyclist who rode for between 2000 and 2008. He is best known for his stage wins in the Giro d'Italia. In 2001, he won on the Passo Pordoi ahead of Gilberto Simoni.
